description.para: Logging levels that will passed to the optional log callback function

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* RallyHereLogCallback) (RallyHereLogLevel level, const char *message, size_t messagen, void *user_data)
memberdef.argsstring: )(RallyHereLogLevel level, const char *message, size_t messagen, void *user_data)
memberdef.name: RallyHereLogCallback

briefdescription.para: Sets the default log level for the SDK and any adapters created. This is only used if a log callback is not set.

description.para: The API uses the pointer handles to represent internal objects.

briefdescription.para: Opaque type and handle to a Rally Here Game Instance Adapter.
Opaque type and handle to a Rally Here String Map.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* RallyHereOnAllocatedCallback) (RallyHereStringMapPtr allocation_info, const RallyHereStatusCode &code, void *user_data)
memberdef.name: RallyHereOnAllocatedCallback

briefdescription.para: Callback to be sent when an allocation is received from the game host adapter.

detaileddescription.para: The callback is responsible for freeing the allocation_info string map

If set, must be set at init time, before using any other APIs. If this is called, then rallyhere_allocator_set_free must also be called. If this is called, then rallyhere_allocator_set_free and rallyhere_allocator_set_realloc must also be called.
callback
A function that takes a size in bytes of memory to allocate.
rallyhere_allocator_set_free
rallyhere_allocator_set_realloc

If set, must be set at init time, before using any other APIs.
callback
An existing pointer p to free.

If set, must be set at init time, before using any other APIs.
callback
A function taking an existing pointer and a new size. See the standard c realloc requirements for behavior.

description.para: Bookend calls for using this SDK. Only the Environment methods may be called before or after these SDK calls.

detaileddescription.para: Custom memory allocation must be made before this call, and no other SDK calls may be made until after this call.
No other SDK calls may be made after this call.

briefdescription.para: An SDK for handling multiple different types of game hosting systems in one set of calls.
